meanings.definition: Firmly fixed or established in a person's mind or behavior.
meanings.sent1: Her engrainedly positive attitude always brightened the room.
meanings.sent2: The engrainedly held beliefs shaped his decisions.
meanings.sent3: His engrainedly love for ice cream led to a freezer full of different flavors.
meanings.sent4: The engrainedly strict rules at the school made it a disciplined environment.
meanings.sent5: The engrainedly cheerful song stuck in her head all day.

meanings.definition: Deeply ingrained or deeply rooted in something.
meanings.sent1: The engrainedly pattern on the fabric was beautiful.
meanings.sent2: His engrainedly loyal nature made him a trustworthy friend.
meanings.sent3: The engrainedly tangled wires resembled a modern art piece.
meanings.sent4: The engrainedly intertwined roots of the trees formed a strong bond.
meanings.sent5: The engrainedly embedded memories resurfaced during the reunion.
